title: tour: Exported names, bug  cannot refer to unexported name math.pi
body:
![a tour of go](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1640105/11896236/dc5408d6-a595-11e5-99ed-77674441b8b8.png)

Context: https://tour.golang.org/basics/3

Click on button RUN response 

prog.go:9: cannot refer to unexported name math.pi
prog.go:9: undefined: math.pi
